articles.description: CNN host explains to Howard Stern why former BF Benjamin Maisani is helping him raise little Wyatt
articles.content:

articles.title: Monk actor Tony Shalhoub says that he and his wife had Covid-19: 'It was a pretty rough few weeks' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Actor Tony Shalhoub has revealed that he and his wife have recovered from the coronavirus.
articles.content:

articles.title: Fact-checking 'Capone': What's true, what's not in Tom Hardy's new gangster movie - USA TODAY
articles.description: Tom Hardy steps into notorious gangster shoes, playing Al Capone in "Capone." What's true, what's not in Josh Trank's new movie (now streaming).
articles.content:
Just when you thought he was out, infamous gangster Al Capone keeps getting dragged back into movies.
